Name: Rugida
About the game: The girl ended up in the dungeons. She's almost dead. And although her heart is now barely beating, she still hopes to get her soul back. A valuable soul that was taken away by evil spirits and turned their forces against the kingdom. She stands up, she is almost ... determined. The dungeon is just the beginning of the journey. And it is already teeming with everything that can be teeming with. Will you help her on this difficult journey? — Third-person action-adventure game; — Fabulous atmosphere; — Original style and soundtrack; — Bright animated characters; — Quests; — A variety of items that affect the game; — Destructibility of the game world; — Generation of the world; — Full random drop-down loot.
